text:
Ramping up production to supply #covid #vaccine is a stance that most #biopharma companies are taking. Capacity is a key element to consider & understanding risks is also crucial. 

Find out more via @PharmaReview article (pg. 38 -41): https://t.co/12TPmqmj3B
#pharma #covid19 https://t.co/C4SPkIRjcO
